title: List of all Android ble  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android ble  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-beacon-library
repoList.description: Allows Android apps to interact with BLE beacons

repoList.name: Android-BLE-Library
repoList.description: A library that makes working with Bluetooth LE on Android a pleasure. Seriously.

repoList.name: RxAndroidBle
repoList.description: An Android Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Library with RxJava2 interface

repoList.name: Android-DFU-Library
repoList.description: A library with DFU feature for Android 4.3+.

repoList.name: Android-Scanner-Compat-Library
repoList.description: A compat library for Bluetooth Low Energy scanning on Android.

repoList.name: beacons-android
repoList.description: Android BLE advertising library

repoList.name: Android-BLE-Common-Library
repoList.description: A companion library for the Android BLE Library. Contains parsers for common Bluetooth SIG characteristics.

repoList.description: BLESSED, a Bluetooth Low Energy library for Android

repoList.description: An easy-to-use BLE library for android.  简单易用的android BLE library
